item.goety_revelation.halo_of_the_end.de: If this is indeed the end of everything———
This fate shall meet its conclusion by my hand.
§7§l Active Effects: §r
§8§o Fireball/Lava Bomb Focus now possess the power of finality.
§8§o Wither Focus will turn into star arrows.
§8§o Barrier Focus will become your sturdiest shield.
§5§l Special Effects:
§6§o Pause the time of the whole world.
§6§o Cooldown: 600s
§7§l Passive Effects:
§8§o You gain an 85% resistance to projectiles and a 66.6% resistance to void damage.
§8§o The power of end surrounds you, which turn you into an immortal.
§8§l§o Powers of The Halo take priority over all other items.
§8§o You will become more and more tenacious after being attacked.
§8§o You are immune to all negative effects and can fly freely like the Creator.
§8§o During §eDays§r§8§o of the §2Overworld§r§8§o, you gain saturation, resistance boost, and regeneration effects.
§8§o During §7Nights§r§8§o of the §2Overworld§r§8§o, you gain night vision, swiftness, haste, and glowing effects.
§8§o In the §4Nether§r§8§o, you gain corpse eater, strength, and repulsion effects.
§8§o In the §5End§r§8§o, you will inflict cursed, spasms, slowness, and weakness effects on entities within 6 blocks around you.
§8§o In the §2Overworld§r§8§o, you will have a 50% damage resistance; in the §4Nether§r§8§o, you will have a 75% damage resistance; in the §5End§r§8§o, you will have a 99% damage resistance.
§8§o All spell energy consumptions are reduced to 1, and cooldown times are greatly shortened.
§8§o You will chant spells at an incredible speed.
§8§o You are immune to §5magic, §cburning, §8falling, §2cactus, §9drowning, §elightning, §6explosion, §4lava, §fcrushing, §8anvil falling, §akinetic energy, §bfreezing, §8suffocation§r§8§o damages.
§8§o When you die, you will be instantly healed to full health, enter invincible phase for 60 seconds, and at the same time, pause time of the whole world for 15 seconds.
§8§o After triggering resurrection, you gain a damage aura. This effect will last 600 seconds, and the cooldown time is 1800 seconds.
§8§o Your attacks are attached with the power of end and can break through defenses of ordinary creatures.
§8§o The Halo will automatically disable curse of binding.
§8§o When you're equiped with The Halo, Divinity of the End will always protect you, even Apocalypse and Ragnarök can't strip your divinity.
item.goety_revelation.random_display.des: Randomly select from all items in the vanilla version as this item
item.goety_revelation.puzzle_display.des: Randomly select from all items in all the Puzzles as this item
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.0: The flower at the end of the road that has not yet bloomed.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.1: The horn that calls for the past.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.2: The dark flame swaying in the gloom.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.3: The dilapidated account of past events.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.4: The creatures extinct in ancient times.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.5: The thing that deceives the God of Death.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.7: The foundation of the sky island.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.8: The beginning of the world's darkness.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.9: The sleeping place of the crupt owner.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.11: The resting place of the living.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.13: The connector of the origin of vitality.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.14: The bright light in the gloom.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.17: The Soul of the Shadow Hunter.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.18: The fragment of the ancient echo.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.19: The eternal companion at the end.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.20: The beloved thing of the first best friend.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.23: A large number of bones are arranged like guards, and the deep and dark place stops the ghosts from crying.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.26: The strange treasures buried deep under the mountains.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.27: Mountain exist in nothingness, I will let the way open.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.30: The anger of those lost in the mortal world.(Goety)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.31: The relics of the barren vitality.(Mincraft)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.34: The golden crown of the gods.(Iron's Spells)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.35: The buried things of the invisible caravan.(Iron's Spells)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.37: The forgotten metal that has never seen the light.(Iron's Spells)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.38: The silent book buried deep in the darkness.(Iron's Spells)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.39: The solidified power of the Blaze God.(L_Ender 's Cataclysm)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.40: The miserable white head of the Cursed Guard.(L_Ender 's Cataclysm)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.41: The bright lamp of the End Fortress.(L_Ender 's Cataclysm)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.42: Hear the MEME of the sky outside the 4th wall.(Alex's Mobs)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.43: The medium of the ancient natural disasters.(Alex's Cave)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.44: The proof of the wilderness challenge.(Ars Nouveau)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.45: The lonely relic under the silent ice.(Aquamirae)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.47: Rely on its endless power and be above death.(Enigmatic Legacy)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.48: The lie of reversing time.(Enigmatic Legacy)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.49: The malice that creates gluttony.(Enigmatic Legacy)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.50: The dagger engraved with curses.(Enigmatic Addons)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.51: The tree of all time future.(Twilight Forest)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.52: The passage to the land of giants.(Twilight Forest)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.53: You may encounter dragons or ruffians.(Ice and Fire)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.54: The vigorous energy source of the legendary behemoth.(Jerotes' Village)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.55: Your nightmare is about the death of your loved ones. You wake up and face an even crazier nightmare.(FantasyEnding)
item.goety_revelation.puzzle.56: The Ender Eye in the Void.(L2 Complements)

§7[Stunned]
 
Prohibit all activities of entities.
